body:
Guildmaster of +Rimworld made multiple posts complaining about being downvoted, calling for Ruqqus to remove downvotes, saying he wants see usernames so he can ban people who downvote him, asking people to upvote him, etc.

https://ruqqus.com/post/264i/remove-votes-from-replies-to-replies

https://ruqqus.com/post/2637/you-should-be-able-to-see

As you might expect he received even more downvotes from people exercising their right to disagree resulting in a knee-jerk kicking of all posts in his guild, including those not made by him.

His rules have been update to include the text:

*Awww, were you looking to downvote everything here, retard? Tough luck.*

A shinning example of an intelligent guildmaster properly using his powers for the good of his guild members
body_html:
Guildmaster of +Rimworld made multiple posts complaining about being downvoted, calling for Ruqqus to remove downvotes, saying he wants see usernames so he can ban people who downvote him, asking people to upvote him, etc.

https://ruqqus.com/post/264i/remove-votes-from-replies-to-replies

https://ruqqus.com/post/2637/you-should-be-able-to-see

As you might expect he received even more downvotes from people exercising their right to disagree resulting in a knee-jerk kicking of all posts in his guild, including those not made by him.

His rules have been update to include the text:

Awww, were you looking to downvote everything here, retard? Tough luck.

A shinning example of an intelligent guildmaster properly using his powers for the good of his guild members
title: Power-Tripping Guildmaster Kicks All Posts After Downvote Tantrum

author.bio:
Morons glorifying Nazis or demonizing Jews are just as bad as the morons who glorify Marxists and demonize anybody to their Right.  

Both are a threat to free discourse, both would have you kneel to their philosophy, and both infest social media.

guild.description:
The official guild for all things Ruqqus.

Rules:

💻 No promotion of other sites that aren't a fork of Ruqqus

🟪 Ruqqus-related only. This is a community dedicated to Ruqqus meta discussion. Content may involve technology and politics but must have ample context in Ruqqus.

📬 No spamming. Spamming comments or posts is not allowed.

😀 Be civil. Be nice. Harassment, trolling, and disruptive behavior is not allowed. Basically, don’t be a jerk.

📜 Follow Ruqqus ToS. This is a given.

For press releases, visit +RuqqusPress.

For updates and patch notes, visit +changelog.

For ideas and feedback, visit +BetaFeedback

For bug reports, visit +RuqqusBugs

body: Adding the ability to disable downvotes per-guild would seriously promote the development of echo-chambers. If we're going to remove downvotes (which we shouldn't), we should do it globally.
body_html: Adding the ability to disable downvotes per-guild would seriously promote the development of echo-chambers. If we're going to remove downvotes (which we shouldn't), we should do it globally.

post.body_html:
Guildmaster of +Rimworld made multiple posts complaining about being downvoted, calling for Ruqqus to remove downvotes, saying he wants see usernames so he can ban people who downvote him, asking people to upvote him, etc.

https://ruqqus.com/post/264i/remove-votes-from-replies-to-replies

https://ruqqus.com/post/2637/you-should-be-able-to-see

As you might expect he received even more downvotes from people exercising their right to disagree resulting in a knee-jerk kicking of all posts in his guild, including those not made by him.

His rules have been update to include the text:

Awww, were you looking to downvote everything here, retard? Tough luck.

A shinning example of an intelligent guildmaster properly using his powers for the good of his guild members
post.title: Power-Tripping Guildmaster Kicks All Posts After Downvote Tantrum

body: dude, your name is literally "fuck spez" which basically means "fuck reddit", a platform which 80% is echo chambers and you acting like an AHS member?
body_html: dude, your name is literally "fuck spez" which basically means "fuck reddit", a platform which 80% is echo chambers and you acting like an AHS member?

guild.description:
The official guild for all things Ruqqus.

Rules:

💻 No promotion of other sites that aren't a fork of Ruqqus

🟪 Ruqqus-related only. This is a community dedicated to Ruqqus meta discussion. Content may involve technology and politics but must have ample context in Ruqqus.

📬 No spamming. Spamming comments or posts is not allowed.

😀 Be civil. Be nice. Harassment, trolling, and disruptive behavior is not allowed. Basically, don’t be a jerk.

📜 Follow Ruqqus ToS. This is a given.

For press releases, visit +RuqqusPress.

For updates and patch notes, visit +changelog.

For ideas and feedback, visit +BetaFeedback

For bug reports, visit +RuqqusBugs

parent.body: Adding the ability to disable downvotes per-guild would seriously promote the development of echo-chambers. If we're going to remove downvotes (which we shouldn't), we should do it globally.
parent.body_html: Adding the ability to disable downvotes per-guild would seriously promote the development of echo-chambers. If we're going to remove downvotes (which we shouldn't), we should do it globally.

Damn. You can't really resist from downvoting me.

post.body:
Guildmaster of +Rimworld made multiple posts complaining about being downvoted, calling for Ruqqus to remove downvotes, saying he wants see usernames so he can ban people who downvote him, asking people to upvote him, etc.

https://ruqqus.com/post/264i/remove-votes-from-replies-to-replies

https://ruqqus.com/post/2637/you-should-be-able-to-see

As you might expect he received even more downvotes from people exercising their right to disagree resulting in a knee-jerk kicking of all posts in his guild, including those not made by him.

His rules have been update to include the text:

*Awww, were you looking to downvote everything here, retard? Tough luck.*

A shinning example of an intelligent guildmaster properly using his powers for the good of his guild members

post.title: Power-Tripping Guildmaster Kicks All Posts After Downvote Tantrum
